field.name: description
field.value:
When using b1007 (not tested on other ones), the documentation [1] says:
HtmlHelper.Link( "mypage.html", "This is a link to my page" )
The function actually does it the other way round. What do we do? Change the code or the docs?
Was it maybe already changed in newer builds?

comment.author: Flominator
comment.text:
* '''Description''' changed from: {quote} When using b1007 (not tested on other ones), the documentation [1] says:
HtmlHelper.Link( "mypage.html", "This is a link to my page" )
The function actually does it the other way round. What do we do? Change the code or the docs?
Was it maybe already changed in never builds (got no download possibility at this pc)? {quote} to: {quote} When using b1007 (not tested on other ones), the documentation [1] says:
HtmlHelper.Link( "mypage.html", "This is a link to my page" )
The function actually does it the other way round. What do we do? Change the code or the docs?
Was it maybe already changed in newer builds? {quote}

comment.author: roelofb
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Duplicate''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
